info.title: AI Interviewer Agent API
info.description: API for AI interview preparation services

post.description:
Start a new interview session.
Creates InterviewSession, persists it, initializes SessionManager, gets first message.
Send a message to an ongoing interview session.
End an interview session and get final summaries.

get.description: Get the conversation history for a session.

schema.title: Response Get Conversation History Api Interview History Get

get.description: Get performance statistics for a session.
Get the generated skill profile for a session (usually after ending).
Get suggested resources for improving a specific skill.

schema.title: Response Get Skill Resources Endpoint Api Interview Skill Resources Get

post.description:
Track resource usage actions.

Args:
    action: Resource action details
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Success message

schema.title: Response Track Resource Action Api Resources Tracking Post

post.description:
Record feedback on a resource.

Args:
    feedback: Resource feedback details
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Success message

schema.title: Response Record Resource Feedback Api Resources Feedback Post

get.description:
Get resource effectiveness metrics.

Args:
    session_id: Session identifier
    skill_name: Optional skill name to filter by
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Resource effectiveness metrics

schema.title: Response Get Resource Effectiveness Api Resources Effectiveness Get

parameters.description: Maximum number of transcripts to return

schema.title: Limit
schema.description: Maximum number of transcripts to return

parameters.name: limit

post.description: Create a transcript from an existing interview session.

parameters.description: Whether the transcript is publicly accessible

schema.title: Is Public
schema.description: Whether the transcript is publicly accessible

parameters.name: is_public

get.description: Export a transcript in the specified format.

post.description: Import a transcript from a file.

parameters.description: User ID to associate with the transcript

schema.title: User Id
schema.description: User ID to associate with the transcript

parameters.name: user_id

post.description: Search for transcripts by semantic similarity.

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

schema.title: Limit
schema.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: limit

schema.title: Response Search Transcripts Api Transcripts Api Transcripts Search Post
Response Get Transcript Tags Api Transcripts Api Transcripts Tags Get

get.description: Serve audio files from the temporary directory.

audio_url.title: Audio Url
audio_url.description: URL to the processed audio file
